The bottom half of the screenshot shows a section for "Saved Items," which appears to be loading, as indicated by the spinning icon.

Press the search button or submit the search query.
Select the first entry for 'razer kraken' from the search results.
Add the item to the cart.
Navigate to the cart and select checkout.
